Winter Exhibition

4 December 2023 to 20 December 2023

Elana Bowsher: Inside Out

15 December 2023 to 28 January 2024

Via Ripense 6, 00153,Rome

Renaissance In The North

19 March to 30 June 2024

Maria-Theresien-Platz, 1010 Wien

Van Gogh in Auvers-sur-Oise The Final Months

Coming Soon

Josephine Baker: Icon in Motion

26 January 2024 to 28 April 2024

Bodestraße 1-3, 10178 Berlin

The exhibition explores the facets and strategies of Baker's framing of her persona in an audio-visual essay, and displays the uniqueness of her dancing style and her radiance on the screen.

My First Louvre

1 January 2024 to 31 December 2024

Carrousel 99, rue de Rivoli, 75001 Paris

Enjoy a child- and family-oriented exploration of the Louvre and learn the secrets behind its most famous artworks, including the Venus de Milo, the Mona Lisa, Egyptian antiquities, and major French paintings.

Chase Palmer: Dazzling Delirium

15 December 2023 to 28 January 2024

Via Ripense 6, 00153,Rome

Chase Palmer's "Dazzling Delirium" challenges traditional mastery through chaotic burlesque and Mannerist influences, critiquing authority by exposing imperfections in classical iconography.

Johan Creten: How to explain the Sculptures to an Influencer ?

18 January 2024 to 2 March 2024

76 rue de Turenne, 75003,Paris

for several years Chen Ke has produced paintings based on photographic portraits, and here presents a series of young female Bauhaus students, alongside architectural photographs

Follow us on

Our mission

EuroTreasure's mission is to spotlight European museums, fostering cultural understanding and offering accessible exploration of art and history. We aim to connect global audiences with Europe's rich heritage, promoting education, inspiration, and the sharing of significant stories found within these museums.
